channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: These investigators patrol Las Vegas looking for one thing: water waste
item.description: The Southern Nevada Water Authority has investigators who patrol Las Vegas neighborhoods in search of wasted water.

item.title: Speaker Johnson slashed Medicaid. His constituents could lose health services

item.title: What will the end of the 'de minimis' rule mean for U.S. consumers?
item.description: On Friday, the U.S. is ending its de minimis rule that made it easy for cheap goods to reach consumers. The change will affect roughly 4 million such ...

item.title: Amtrak's flagship Acela trains get a long-awaited upgrade

item.title: Hundreds honor 2 children killed and 17 people wounded in shooting at a Minneapolis Catholic school

item.title: With India’s corporate banking lagging decades behind consumer fintech, TransBnk raises $25M to bridge the gap
item.description: TransBnk has raised $25 million in a round led by Bessemer Venture Partners to digitize India’s corporate banking.

item.title: Maisa AI gets $25M to fix enterprise AI’s 95% failure rate
item.description: Maisa AI is built on the premise that enterprise automation requires accountable AI agents, not opaque black boxes.

item.title: More than 10 European startups became unicorns this year

item.title: Nvidia reports record sales as the AI boom continues
item.description: Nvidia's revenue hit $46.7 billion in the second quarter, a 56% increase compared to the same period last year.
